mapper.select: SELECT p.pCode, p.pBrandName, p.pName ,po.pColor, p.pPrice, po.pStock, p.pinsertdate, pf.pfName, pf.pfRealName FROM product p, productoption po, productfile pf WHERE p.pCode = po.pCode and p.pCode = pf.pCode and p.pDeleted=0 LIMIT #{index_no},7
SELECT COUNT(*) AS dCount FROM product p, productoption po, productfile pf WHERE p.pCode = po.pCode AND p.pCode = pf.pCode

SELECT pc.pcInsertDate as pcInsertDate, p.pBrandName as pBrandName, p.pName as pName, pc.pcQty as pcQty, pc.pcQty*p.pPrice as sum FROM product p, purchase pc WHERE p.pCode = pc.pCode and pc.pcInsertDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by pc.pcInsertDate

SELECT DAYNAME(pc.pcInsertDate) , SUM(p.pPrice * pc.pcQty) as daySum FROM purchase pc, product p GROUP BY DAYNAME(pc.pcInsertDate) ORDER BY FIELD(DAYNAME(pc.pcInsertDate), 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday')

SELECT p.pCode, p.pBrandName, p.pName ,po.pColor, p.pPrice, po.pStock, p.pinsertdate, pf.pfName, pf.pfRealName FROM product p, productoption po, productfile pf WHERE p.pCode = po.pCode and p.pCode = pf.pCode and p.pDeleted=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (pName, pBrandName, pPrice, pInsertDate, cgNo) VALUES (#{pName}, #{pBrandName}, #{pPrice}, NOW(), #{cgNo})
INSERT INTO productoption (pCode,pStock,pColor) SELECT #{pCode}, #{pStock} ,#{pColor} FROM product p WHERE p.pName= #{pName}

INSERT INTO productfile (pfName, pfRealName, pfHoverName, pfHoverRealName, pCode) SELECT #{pfName}, #{pfRealName}, #{pfHoverName}, #{pfHoverRealName}, pCode FROM product WHERE pCode = #{pCode} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT pc.pcNo, pc.uid, pc.pCode, po.pColor, pc.pcQty, pc.pcInsertDate, pc.pcStatus FROM purchase pc, product p, productoption po WHERE p.pCode = pc.pCode and p.pCode = po.pCode and po.pCode = pc.pCode and pc.pColor = po.pColor order by pc.pcNo desc
mapper.update: update purchase pc,product p set pc.pcStatus =#{pcStatus} where p.pCode= pc.pCode and pc.pcNo = #{pcNo}
mapper.select: SELECT n.nNo, n.aid, n.nTitle, n.nInsertDate FROM notice n, admin a WHERE n.aid = a.aid and n.nCgNo=1
SELECT n.nNo, n.aid, n.nTitle, n.nInsertDate, n.nContent FROM notice n, admin a WHERE n.aid = a.aid and n.nCgNo=2
mapper.update: UPDATE product p, productoption po SET pDeleteDate=now() ,pDeleted =1 WHERE p.pCode = #{pCode} and po.pColor = #{pColor}
UPDATE product SET pName = #{pName}, pBrandName = #{pBrandName}, pPrice = #{pPrice} WHERE pCode = #{pCode}
UPDATE productoption SET pColor = #{pColor}, pStock = #{pStock} WHERE pCode = #{pCode}
UPDATE productfile SET pfName = #{lastfile}, pfRealName = #{lastfile} WHERE pCode = #{pCode}
UPDATE productfile SET pfName = #{pfName}, pfRealName = #{pfRealName} WHERE pCode = #{pCode}
mapper.select: SELECT pc.pColor AS pColor, SUM(pc.pcQty * p.pPrice) AS total FROM purchase pc, product p WHERE pc.pCode = p.pCode GROUP BY pc.pColor

SELECT pc.pcNo, pc.uid, pc.pCode, po.pColor, pc.pcQty, pc.pcInsertDate, pc.pcStatus FROM purchase pc, product p, productoption po WHERE p.pCode = pc.pCode and p.pCode = po.pCode and po.pCode = pc.pCode and pc.pColor = po.pColor and pc.pcStatus != 2 order by pc.pcNo desc

SELECT r.rNo as rNo,p.pName as pName, r.pcNo as pcNo, r.pCode as pCode, r.rScore as rScore, r.uid as uid , r.pColor as pColor, r.uNickName as uNickName, r.rTitle as rTitle, r.rContent as rContent, r.rInsertDate as rInsertDate FROM review r, product p WHERE p.pCode = r.pCode
